schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
schemes.benefits: Insurance coverage for crop losses due to natural calamities, pests, and diseases
schemes.eligibility: All farmers growing notified crops in notified areas

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
schemes.benefits: ₹6,000/year paid in 3 instalments to eligible land-owning farmers
schemes.eligibility: Land-owning small & marginal farmers (subject to exclusions)

schemes.name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
schemes.benefits: Short-term crop loans, working capital, term loans for agriculture activities
schemes.premium: Interest rate varies; interest subvention available

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
schemes.benefits: 'Har Khet ko Pani' — irrigation coverage, micro-irrigation support, water conservation
schemes.premium: Subsidies for micro-irrigation, per drop more crop (state-varied)

schemes.name: Soil Health Card Scheme
schemes.benefits: Periodic soil testing and nutrient recommendations to farmers
schemes.eligibility: All farmers (coverage depends on state capacity)

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Maandhan Yojana (PM-KMY)
schemes.premium: Farmer contribution ₹55-200/month (age dependent) plus government contribution
schemes.eligibility: Small & marginal farmers aged 18-40 (landholding limits apply)

schemes.name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan (PM-KUSUM)
schemes.benefits: Support/subsidy for solar pumps, decentralised renewable power for agriculture
schemes.premium: Subsidy levels vary (can be up to 60% for certain beneficiaries)

schemes.name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
schemes.benefits: Support to climate resilience, water conservation, soil health and organic farming
